sentences.en: Conclusion The established dot blot technique is practicable and economical.
sentences.cn: 结论建立的斑点杂交技术经济简便,切实可行.

sentences.en: If stations are only intermittently visible it may be the only practicable system.
sentences.cn: 若有一些方向只能断斯续续地通视,这可能是唯一实用的方法.

sentences.en: In contrast, where predeprivation process would be practicable, the Court has insisted on it.
sentences.cn: 对比之下, 如果预先剥夺程序实际可行的话, 最高法院坚持主张这一作法.

sentences.en: In Weinberger , the goal of the statute was to eliminate water pollution to the extent practicable.
sentences.cn: 温伯格一案的目标是根除水污染达到符合标准的程度.

sentences.en: Is it practicable to try to develop agriculture in desert regions?
sentences.cn: 试图在沙漠地区发展农业可行 吗 ?

sentences.en: It is not reasonably practicable to offer her the original job back.
sentences.cn: 让她继续做原来的工作在情理上行不通。

sentences.en: It is their duty to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, that the equipment is safe.
sentences.cn: 在力所能及的情况下确保设备安全是他们的职责。

sentences.en: Please weigh the above points and see if they are practicable.
sentences.cn: 以上几点意见是否可行,请酌定.

sentences.en: Sod seeding is now a practicable proposition on permanent pastures of the better soils.
sentences.cn: 在有比较优良的土壤的永久草场上,草皮播种是一项可行的事.

sentences.en: Teachers can only be expected to do what is reasonable and practicable.
sentences.cn: 教师只应该做合情合理而且切实可行的事。

sentences.en: The only practicable course of action is to sell the company.
sentences.cn: 唯一可行的做法是把公司卖掉。

sentences.en: The proposal he set forward is practicable.
sentences.cn: 他提出的建议是可行的.

sentences.en: They neglected to enquire whether these Methods: Were possible or practicable.
sentences.cn: 他们不去问问这些方法是否办得到,是否行得通.

sentences.en: We hold a sure card to be practicable.
sentences.cn: 我们认为万全之策是切实可行的.

sentences.en: What we need is practicable tools.
sentences.cn: 我们需要的是适用的工具.

sentences.en: Within the compass of a normal sized book such a comprehensive survey was not practicable.
sentences.cn: 在通常一本书的篇幅中要作如此全面的调查不太实际。

words.tran_cn: 实用性，实际性；实际，实例
练习，实践；实施，实行；从事
可用的；行得通的；可实行的

trans.tran_cn: 切实可行的，行得通的，实际的，实用的，可以通行的
trans.tran_en: able to be done; likely to be successful
